covidphdata 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

Description

covidphdata

An Interface to the Philippines Department of Health COVID-19 Data Drop

Get identifiers

datadrop_id_latest() datadrop_id_archive() datadrop_id() datadrop_id_file()

Get Google Drive ID for latest or archive DoH Data Drop folders

List files and folders

datadrop_ls()

List files and folders within a specified DoH Data Drop Google Drive folder

Get data

datadrop_get() datadrop_get_changelog() datadrop_get_sheets() datadrop_get_fields() datadrop_get_cases() datadrop_get_tests() datadrop_get_cdaily() datadrop_get_cweekly() datadrop_get_qdaily() datadrop_get_qweekly()

Retrieve datasets from specified DoH Data Drop folders

Utilities

datadrop_download()

Download DoH Data Drop file via its Google Drive ID

Contents

Developed by Ernest Guevarra.
